query:
SELECT
  ingredients.name AS ingredient_name,
  reports.created_at,
  MIN(products.comparative_price) * amount AS "price!"
FROM ingredients
LEFT JOIN products
	ON products.ingredient_id = ingredients.id
LEFT JOIN reports
	ON products.report_id = reports.id
GROUP BY 
    ingredient_id, 
    report_id, 
    ingredients.name, 
    reports.created_at, 
    ingredients.amount
